exports.name: and
exports.description: Returns true if both operands are true.

content.content:
true::and(true) // true
true::and(false) // false
false::and(true) // false
false::and(false) // false

exports.name: equals
exports.description: Returns the strict equality of the two operands.

parameters.name: right
parameters.description: The right operand to compare to.

exports.name: not
exports.description: Returns the negation of the boolean.

exports.name: or
exports.description: Returns true if either of the operands is true.

content.content:
true::or(true) // true
true::or(false) // true
false::or(true) // true
false::or(false) // false

exports.name: xor
exports.description: Returns true if one and only one of the conditions is true.

content.content:
true::and(true) // false
true::and(false) // true
false::and(true) // true
false::and(false) // false

exports.name: partial
exports.description: Returns a version of the function that has given parameters prefilled and passes given parameters through to the original, denoted by placeholders.

examples.title: Fill Only the Second Last Argument

exports.name: aggregate
exports.description: Yields all the accumulations of the iterator with a given accumulator method.

typeParameters.name: rT
typeParameters.description: The item type of the returned iterator.

typeParameters.name: iT
typeParameters.description: The item type of the input iterator.

exports.name: convolve
exports.description: Maps the iterator with the additional tail of k previous items. k is determined by the number of items in the accumulation iterator.

typeParameters.name: rT
typeParameters.description: The item type of the returned iterator.

typeParameters.name: iT
typeParameters.description: The item type of the input iterator.

exports.name: count
exports.description: Yields the number of items in the iterator.

exports.name: difference
exports.description: Yields the sorted difference iterator of two sorted iterators.

parameters.name: comparator
parameters.description: The sorting value function. Should return 0 when items are equal, a positive number when the item on the left is greater and a negative number when the item on the right is greater.

exports.name: drop
exports.description: Yields the items that don't qualify the condition.

exports.name: dropWhile
exports.description: Yields the first item that matches condition, and all the items after that.

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: A condition called on every item to see if it should be dropped.

exports.name: find
exports.description: Yields the first item that qualifies the condition.

exports.name: first
exports.description: Yields the k-th item of the iterator.

exports.name: fork
exports.description: Forks the iterator and yields the forks.

exports.name: head
exports.description: Yields the k first items of the iterator.

exports.name: intersection
exports.description: Yields the sorted intersection iterator of two sorted iterators.

parameters.name: comparator
parameters.description: The sorting value function. Should return 0 when items are equal, a positive number when the item on the left is greater and a negative number when the item on the right is greater.

exports.name: last
exports.description: Yields the k-th item from the end of the iterator.

exports.name: map
exports.description: Yields the items of the iterator mapped through a given transformer.

typeParameters.name: iT
typeParameters.description: The item type of the input iterator.

typeParameters.name: rT
typeParameters.description: The item type of the returned iterator.

exports.name: quickSort
exports.description: A pure JS alternative to the builtin sort - operates directly on iterators, so it can be advantageous to native sort in cases where you only need a few of the sorted items, e.g. 15 first products sorted by price. The first items get sorted precisely first so the whole set does not necessarily need to be sorted.

exports.name: reduce
exports.description: Yields the accumulation of the iterator with a given accumulator method.

typeParameters.name: rT
typeParameters.description: The item type of the returned iterator.

typeParameters.name: iT
typeParameters.description: The item type of the input iterator.

exports.name: reverse
exports.description: Yields the items of the iterator in reverse order.

exports.name: sort
exports.description: Yields the items of the iterator sorted by a given comparator.

exports.name: sortAlphabetically
exports.description: Yields the items of the iterator sorted by a given comparator.

exports.name: sortAlphabeticallyBy
exports.description: Yields the items of the iterator sorted by a given comparator.

exports.name: sortBy
exports.description: Yields the items of the iterator sorted based on score of the item returned by the transformer.

exports.name: tail
exports.description: Yields the k last items of the iterator.

exports.name: take
exports.description: Yields the items that qualify the condition.

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: A condition function to see if the item should be taken.

exports.name: takeWhile
exports.description: Yields the items until an item that matches the condition is found.

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: A condition called on every item to see if it should be taken.

exports.name: to
exports.description: Unwraps the iterator into a collection.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The constructor for the collection type.

exports.name: union
exports.description: Yields the sorted union iterator of two sorted iterators.

parameters.name: comparator
parameters.description: The sorting value function. Should return 0 when items are equal, a positive number when the item on the left is greater and a negative number when the item on the right is greater.

exports.name: uniq
exports.description: Yields the items that aren't equal to the previous item based on a comparator.

parameters.name: comparator
parameters.description: The function to assert equality of the items.

exports.name: abs
exports.description: Returns the absolute value of the number.

exports.name: acos
exports.description: Returns the inverse cosine of the number.

exports.name: add
exports.description: Returns the sum of two numbers.

exports.name: asin
exports.description: Returns the arcsine of the number.

exports.name: atan
exports.description: Returns the arctangent of the number.

exports.name: cos
exports.description: Returns the cosine of the number.

exports.name: div
exports.description: Returns the division of two numbers.

exports.name: max
exports.description: Returns the larger of two numbers.

exports.name: min
exports.description: Returns the smaller of two numbers.

exports.name: mod
exports.description: Returns the modulo of two numbers.

exports.name: mul
exports.description: Returns the multiplication of two numbers.

exports.name: pow
exports.description: Returns the n-th power of the number.

exports.name: sign
exports.description: Returns the sign of the number, indicating whether the number is positive, negative or zero.

exports.name: sin
exports.description: Returns the sine of the number.

exports.name: sub
exports.description: Returns the subtraction of two numbers.

exports.name: tan
exports.description: Returns the tangent of the number.

exports.name: prop
exports.description: Returns the value of the property by given key.

exports.name: toFunction
exports.description: Returns a function that always returns the given value.

thisParameter.description: The value the function should return.
